body.section:
Issues Fixed in this Release
CVE-2015-7547 - glibc getaddrinfo() stack-based buffer overflow
Linux for HPE Helion has been updated to fix CVE-2015-7547.
CVE-2016-2074 (Remote Code Execution attack in OVS).
Emulex be2net driver: unsuccessful NIC failover fixedThis release addresses a failover issue with the Emulex NIC driver in HPE Linux. When the primary network uplink is removed from the switch, the disconnect carrier signal is not sent to the Emulex driver telling it to switch over to the secondary path.
